text: Maristas Colegio Sagrado Corazón Valencia (also Marist College Valencia and Sacred Heart College Valencia) was founded by the Marist Brothers in 1897 in Valencia, Spain. Students range from pre-primary through secondary. ==References== Category:Marist Brothers schools Category:Catholic schools in Spain Category:Educational institutions established in 1897
title: Maristas Colegio Sagrado Corazón Valencia
